page.title: 12Employment in Curry Rivel
page.content: In Curry Rivel there are not many people who are unemployed. The majority of people who are unemployed are 18 year olds or school leavers. In Curry Rivel a lot of people go to work in Taunton or Yeovil or Bridgwater in big companies offices or shops. Some people work near to Curry Rivel or in Curry Rivel itself in little shops. Around Curry Rivel there are quite a lot of farms, some are dairy farms. In Curry Rivel there is a bus company and some people work there. A lot of people live in Curry Rivel because it is fairly central for either Taunton or Yeovil and that is where a lot of people work. Some people also work in Langport in the shops or companies there. Agriculture is the main form of work, followed by Westlands Helicopters and the Royal Naval base at Yeovilton.
